mapper.insert: insert into saleascount (vdate, number, costPrice, costAmount, salePrice, saleAmount, product_id, saleman_id, member_id) values (#{vdate}, #{number}, #{costPrice}, #{costAmount}, #{salePrice}, #{saleAmount}, #{product_id}, #{saleman_id}, #{member_id})
mapper.update: update saleascount set vdate = #{vdate}, number = #{number}, costPrice = #{costPrice}, costAmount = #{costAmount}, salePrice = #{salePrice}, saleAmount = #{saleAmount}, product_id = #{product_id}, saleman_id = #{saleman_id}, member_id = #{member_id} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, vdate, number, costPrice, costAmount, salePrice, saleAmount, product_id, saleman_id, member_id from saleascount where id = #{id}
select id, vdate, number, costPrice, costAmount, salePrice, saleAmount, product_id, saleman_id, member_id from saleascount
